message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - lombok.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.time.LocalDateTime' import. Should be before 'reactor.core.publisher.Mono'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.HashMap' import. Should be before 'reactor.core.publisher.Mono'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'reactor.core.publisher.Mono'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.UUID' import. Should be before 'reactor.core.publisher.Mono'.
Import statement for 'io.r2dbc.postgresql.PostgresqlConnectionFactoryProvider.OPTIONS' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity.notFound' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity.ok' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
'lambda arguments' has incorrect indentation level 28, expected level should be one of the following: 20, 24.
'lambda arguments' has incorrect indentation level 28, expected level should be one of the following: 20, 24.
'method call rparen' has incorrect indentation level 20, expected level should be 16.
